name: The International Congress on Psychiatry
content: The International Congress on Psychiatry (CP 2022) will be held from May 30-June 1, 2022 in Xi'an, China. CP 2022 will cover issues on Mental Health and Well-being, Research, Education and Case Studies on Mental Health,Neuroscience Nursing and Neurosurgery, Stress, Anxiety and Depression, Self-harm and Suicide Prevention . It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
